backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining provider, patient, consultation, fitness, and membership data with authorization checks and profile/provider management APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable feature report linking high-level features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains a JSON object summarizing the AdminMembershipPlansPanel React component for CRUD management of membership plans.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining global styles, theme variables, and dark mode tokens for the UI.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx and defining the page shell.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all top-level routes and wrapping the app in theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard component that requires Internet Identity login and loads the callerâ€™s profile before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for first-time users to create and save their profile using the backend API.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with navigation, auth handling, and responsive mobile menu driven by identity and user role.
frontend/src/components/vip/VIPBadge.tsx: Displays a VIP badge with tooltip when the user has VIP status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, status tracking, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, providers, and consultations via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports global CSS from the parent index file.
frontend/src/lib/nutrition/rules.ts: Generates nutrition recommendations based on profile, goals, preferences, allergies, and activity level.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountPage.t: Account page showing editable user profile, VIP status, and profile setup flow behind auth gate.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFitnessPan: Admin UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting fitness class offerings using CRUD query hooks and a form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMembership: Admin panel to manage membership plans with create, edit, and delete functionality via modal forms and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPage.tsx: Main admin dashboard that checks admin permissions and displays tabs for managing providers, fitness listings, and membership plans.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProvidersP: Admin interface for listing providers and creating new provider entries through a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/consultations/Consult: User page for viewing consultations and requesting new appointments with providers through a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/fitness/FitnessPage.t: Fitness listings page that filters Zumba and gym offerings by type, mode, and location, with VIP status support.
frontend/src/pages/my-care/MyCareAssista: Renders a care assistant interface where users can add, categorize, and view personal health-related entries. Manages entry creation via dialog and displays filtered items with icons and colors.
frontend/src/pages/nutrition/NutritionPa: Displays a nutrition survey and generates personalized nutrition recommendations based on user profile and inputs. Handles form state, activity level selection, and recommendation rendering.
frontend/src/pages/pricing/PricingPage.t: Shows membership plans with pricing, duration labels, VIP status indicators, and loading states. Highlights popular plans and supports plan listing and selection.
frontend/src/pages/providers/ProviderDet: Fetches and displays details for a single provider, including consultation options and biography. Supports navigation and booking behavior depending on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/providers/ProvidersDi: Lists healthcare providers with category filtering and a hero section describing services. Includes category icons, filtering logic, and navigation to provider details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session state or URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, container settings, shadows, and keyframes, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file storing project metadata, feature list, requirements mapping, issues, and image needs for a healthcare website platform.
